articles.author: Hyung-Jin Kim, Kim Tong-hyung
articles.title: North Korea test-fires ballistic missiles ahead of Trump’s Asia trip - AP News
articles.description: North Korea has performed its first ballistic missile tests in five months, days before U.S. President Donald Trump and other leaders are expected to meet in South Korea. South Korea’s military detected multiple short-range ballistic missiles launched Wednesd…
articles.content: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) North Korea performed its first ballistic missile tests in five months Wednesday, days before U.S. President Donald Trump and other leaders are expected to meet in South Korea… [+3194 chars]
